x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Mobile SSO Table Check

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><description/><name>Mobile SSO Table Check</name><order>400</order><probe_type display_value="Mobile SSO">e9dc377c1b681510ae5b21b5ec4bcb49</probe_type><remediation/><script><![CDATA[var diag = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
//var result = diag.getTableParent('oauth_entity');
var result = diag.getTableParent('x_nuvo_wm_shelf');
if (result.startsWith('No Parent Table')){
	gs.info('');
	gs.error('******************* HI TICKET NEEDED *******************');
	gs.info('');
	
	gs.info('The table oauth_entity has a null value of for extends table');
	gs.info('The table oauth_entity should inherit from the application file Table (sys_metadata)');
	gs.info('Please open a HI ticket with ServiceNow to address');
	
	gs.info('');
	gs.info('*********************************************************');
	gs.info('');
}

//gs.info(result);
]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Anthony.Santos@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-03 19:40:09</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>bb2cd4261b6f70507798a9b7624bcbf4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Mobile SSO Table Check</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_bb2cd4261b6f70507798a9b7624bcbf4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-05 14:48:24</sys_updated_on></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
